# Security Policy

## Scope

This is a theoretical physics/mathematics repository. It does not contain:
- Executable software with security implications
- User authentication systems
- Network services
- Sensitive data handling

## Reporting

If you find a security issue in any auxiliary code (Python scripts, build scripts), please open a regular issue.

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported |
|---------|-----------|
| v0.4.x  | Yes       |
| < v0.4  | No        |
